basics.name: Ji-Hoon Oh
basics.label: Ph.D. in Climate Science
basics.summary:
My research focuses on __large-scale climate dynamics__, with a particular interest in the effects of __Antarctic meltwater forcing__ and the __hysteresis and irreversibility__ of the climate system in mitigation scenarios. I specialize in __integrating Earth system models__ to explore these phenomena. I have conducted several large-ensemble climate simulations using both CESM1 and 2 model. I'm recently focusing on the __tipping point of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC)__.
In my free time, I enjoy not only research but also good drinks, experiencing great nature, going to the gym, and snowboarding. Feel free to reach out to me via email with any questions or inquiries.
